messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: “I am proud to stand for the Labour Party in the area that I was born and brought up in. I have worked in low paid, seasonal jobs and have lived in rented accommodation, so I understand the issues local people face. People work to live, they don't live to work. We will end the scourge of in-work poverty. Please vote for me so we can rebuild Cornwall for the many, not the few.”
